short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to collapse old comments based on user input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that allows you to automatically collapse old comment threads when you revisit an interesting discussion.

It injects a small form to the top of a discussion thread which allows you to bulk-collapse all comment trees that don't have a comment newer than the selected time.
